name: ArchiveHeader.Field
desc: An enumeration that describes the type, key, and value of a header field.

items.name: case blob(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, size: UInt64, offset: UInt64)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is a data blob.

items.name: case flag(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is a flag.

items.name: case hash(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, hashFunction: ArchiveHash, value: ContiguousArray<UInt8>)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is a hash.

items.name: case string(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, value: String)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is a string.

items.name: case timespec(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, value: timespec)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is a time value.

items.name: case uint(key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey, value: UInt64)
items.desc: An enumeration that indicates the field is an unsigned integer.

items.name: var key: ArchiveHeader.FieldKey
items.desc: The field key of this field.

items.name: var type: ArchiveHeader.FieldType
items.desc: The field type of this field.
